amendment.description: To make available up to $60,000,000 for Operation and Maintenance, Defense-wide, for certain childcare services and family assistance centers for members of the Armed Forces and their families, and up to $40,000,000 for the purpose of National Guard counterdrug support activities.

action.text: Amendment SA 1896 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Dayton.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1896.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1896 made in Senate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1896 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: The point of order and subsequent motion to waive were rendered moot when the Amendment SA 1896 was agreed to.
